definitions.definition: Full extent; distance between extreme limits; especially; the distance between the nearest surfaces of two bodies, or the space between walls.
examples: a room ten feet square in the clear

definitions.definition: The completion of a stage or challenge , or of the whole game.
examples: It took me weeks to achieve a one-credit clear ( 1CC ).

definitions.definition: A person who is free from the influence of engrams .

main_definition: ( carpentry ) Full extent; distance between extreme limits; especially; the distance between the nearest surfaces of two bodies, or the space between walls.
secondary_definitions: ( video games ) The completion of a stage or challenge , or of the whole game.
( Scientology ) A person who is free from the influence of engrams .
